cause.description:
While watching Live Earth, I questioned myself on my carbon output. I was already recycling, reducing and conserving but I knew I had to do more. Besides trying to exchange ideas on my Facebook group," I am Earth", I decided to start this cause.
I hope you'll consider joining up.
1. To share ideas
2. To reduce our carbon footprint
3. To leave Earth better than we found it
cause.mission: To help people from Earth reduce their environmental impact!
cause.name: I Am Earth
